Key Match Events: Kristaps Porziņģis recorded 25 points, 11 rebounds, 2 steals, and 1 block, with 20 points coming from the restricted area or at the free throw line.
Post-Match Reflections: Joe Mazzulla praised Porziņģis for his performance, stating he was big-time at both ends of the floor and that they worked to get him the ball against smaller matchups.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Celtics only attempted 35 3-pointers (second-lowest total of the season) and made just 12.
Without Nikola Jokic, the Nuggets had to go small, which benefited the Celtics.
